com.sterlingcommerce.activity

Class SCActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.activity.SCActivity

  • public class SCActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods to raise events and other utilities. Class also controls worker and timer jobs. asmishra

        public static void raiseEvent(java.lang.String eventId,
                              org.w3c.dom.Document eventData)
        Raises an event for given event id and event data. Both passed parameters should not be null. If passed null, event will not be raised. eventId id of the event to be raised eventData data to be passed to the listeners
